fields.description:
The URL is use for REST API request. Get the router IP address to used for the request. You can find the Wireless LAN adapter Wi-Fi IPv4 address using ipconfig (Window OS) or ifconfig (Linux OS) command.
URL of the localhost that you host the Frepple. E.g. http://192.168.112.1:5000. You should enter the IP address of docker if you installed Frepple with docker desktop.
fields.label: URL

fields.description: Tick the box to enable Frepple integration. Data will export automatically to Frepple now after creating the data.
fields.label: Frepple Integration

fields.description: To render the Frepple Page in ERPNext. Can be found under frepple djangosettings.py file.
fields.label: Secret Key
